alert.note: Alert for Merrimack (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 23 at 11:09AM EST until December 24 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Gray ME has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in New Hampshire... Soucook River Near Pembroke affecting Merrimack County. For the Soucook River...including Pembroke...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING TO LATE TONIGHT... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Soucook River near Pembroke. * WHEN...From this evening to late tonight. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, Low lying areas flood. At 12.0 feet, A home downstream of Pembroke Road bridge begins to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - There is no current observed data. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage this evening to a crest of 11.2 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late this evening. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...No available flood history. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
